labels.label:
Replaces the flowfile
content with success
status message as
response of the API

Sends the response
to the corresponding
request with
200 response code

Converts the JSON
data into corresponding
SQL statement.
This processor requires
flat JSON as input.

Replaces the flowfile
content with failure
status message as
response of the API
Insert POST API data (employee details) into Oracle Database

Sends the response
to the corresponding
request with
404 response code

Creates POST API
endpoint listening
to port 8013 and
path /post/empdetails

Executes the SQL
statement on specified
DB (Oracle) table.
Based on the execution
of the SQL query flowfile
is directed to success
or failure relationship
